document_data.name: Snowskis
document_data.value2e: {{Split table|rca=right|Size Medium or Smaller|15 [[gp]]|Size Large and Above|20 gp}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Snowskis''', also known as '''skis and poles''', were a type of equipment designed for faster movement in snowy regions, particularly in sloped or hilly areas.
document_data.Description: Snowskis were narrow strips of semi-rigid material, most often wood, with leather straps that wrapped them around a wearer's [[boots]]. Those sold in ''[[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]]'' were typically constructed with [[oak]].
document_data.Availability: * In the city of [[Immilmar]], they could be purchased at the shop [[Sleighs and Skis]].

Notable Users.Classes: * [[Arctic druid]]s occasionally constructed [[item enchantment|enchanted]] snowskis.{{Cite dragon/209/Branching Out All Over|12}}
Notable Users.Individuals: * [[Martine|Martine of Sembia]] often wore a pair of snowskis when she was in the [[Samek Valley]].
Notable Users.Groups:
* The [[Vani]], a [[gnome]] tribe in the [[Samek Valley]], frequently utilized snowskis.
* The use of snowskis was quite common among the [[Rashemi]].{{Cite web/Candlekeep forum/Questions for Ed Greenwood (2005)/Snow Equipment}} In their homeland of [[Rashemen]], skiing contests were often held.
Notable Users.Regions & Settlements:
* The town of [[Eshpurta]] annually held a winter sports festival in [[Deepwinter]] that featured skiing.
* The town of [[Icewind Dale]] had a resort dedicated to skiing, known as [[Breakneck Resort]].{{Cite polyhedron/121/Contests|22}}
